scripts.test: npm run compile && mocha --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill
scripts.compile: browserify src/index.js --outfile static/index.js -t babelify --presets es2015 --presets stage-1
scripts.dev-js: watchify --debug src/index.js --outfile static/index.js -t babelify --presets es2015 --presets stage-1
scripts.textures: atlasbuilder\atlasbuilder.exe --output static\img\graphics img/brick_blue.png img/brick_red.png img/brick_green.png img/brick_grey.png img/brick_purple.png img/brick_torq.png img/brick_yellow.png
